Event: JNIM claimed an attack on FAMa and Russian forces in Niono, Mali.
Description: JNIM claimed responsibility for an attack against Malian Armed Forces (FAMa) and Russian forces in Niono, Mali. The attack's timing is recent and presumably aimed at undermining the joint military presence in the region, reflecting ongoing conflict dynamics involving local jihadist groups and foreign military collaboration in Mali.
